overview: The film about the choice of path, service and the secrets of the profession is dedicated to the actor, director, teacher Igor Klass (1939–2022). He starred in more than a hundred films, the audience knew from his roles in the films “The Road Home”, “Pirates of the 20th Century”, the series “Drongo” and “Battle for Moscow”. People’s Artists of Russia Nikolay Dostal, Andrei Smirnov and other famous artists and directors appear on screen
title: My Master Klass
